players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob's death is tragic. We must analyze who benefits. Diana and Alice, share your thoughts."
Diana: "Diana here. I've investigated Alice and can confirm she is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest Alice to prevent further deaths."
You: "I find Diana's accusation suspiciously timed and lacking evidence. Why would she reveal her investigation results so bluntly without more proof?"
Diana: "Diana again. My claim is based on my investigation, which is my only way to identify the mafia. Alice’s silence and deflection only strengthen my suspicion. We must act now."
Charlie: "Diana's detective claim seems credible. Alice's silence and weak defense are suspicious. I'm voting Alice."
